1066050.name: GOD WARS The Complete Legend - Beginners Support Set
1066050.description:
The ultimate items to help support beginner level players who have just started playing Strategic and Tactical RPGs.

In addition to the accessory set which enables you to substantially obtain experience points, gold, and JP, the powerful “Sun series” items
will definitely help you challenge the game!

【Additional Items】
Amaterasu’s Necklace / Amaterasu’s Earrings / Aome’s Necklace / Aome’s Earrings / Ookami’s Necklace / Ookami’s Earrings / Sun Sword / Sun Helmet / Sun Armor / Sun Gauntlet

【How to find these items】
Go to "Inventory" → Go to "Weapons" and/or "Accessories" → You will find these in the pull-down list.
1066050.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 繁体中文
